article: the lessons china learned in beating back sars earlier this year can help it fight its aids epidemic _ as long as the central government keeps providing quick and honest information , the head of the u.n. aids agency said friday .
abstract: china can use lessons from anti-sars battle to take on aids u.n. expert says
